DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluates the impact of essential oils massage on anxiety of patients who are suffering from cancer at a metastasis stage. Half of patients will be massaged first by essential oils and then by oil only. The other half will be massaged first by oil and then by essential oils.
DOC.brief_title: Essential Oils on Anxiety of Patients Suffering From Cancer
